display_long_description:
# Experience combat in VR like never before


With more than 10 hours of single-player campaign game time and 3 chapters each presenting a different landscape and a ton of unique enemies. You’re bound to learn how to deal with them efficiently, with everything you have at your disposal. 
[media]
[media]
Are you a battle-hardened veteran who loves swords and axes? Or a spell-weaving patron of the arcane arts? Maybe an agile rogue who mastered the way of daggers and bow & arrow? Or you prefer throwing weapons? Well, you can basically throw every weapon in Grimlord.
[media]
[media]
With hundreds of weapon customizations, you can truly craft a unique instrument of killing you can call your own. Combine with our physics-based combat mechanics, you can perform all the weapon techniques in game. Oh, did I mention, if you’re using a claymore, you can even do mordhau.
[media]
[media]
There are more than a dozen bosses to challenge, each with their unique design and backstory. They’re not your typical damage sponges, fights with them are epic battle of wits and agility, brains and brawn.
[media]
[media]
[media]
[media]

# Experience combat in VR like never before


With more than 10 hours of single-player campaign game time and 3 chapters each presenting a different landscape and a ton of unique enemies. You’re bound to learn how to deal with them efficiently, with everything you have at your disposal.

Are you a battle-hardened veteran who loves swords and axes? Or a spell-weaving patron of the arcane arts? Maybe an agile rogue who mastered the way of daggers and bow & arrow? Or you prefer throwing weapons? Well, you can basically throw every weapon in Grimlord.
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39001714_1507974673219564_1452701867122163118_n.mp4?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=RlASGqqxJFcQ7kNvwHu8Ub-&_nc_oc=AdnoLCtACvqBxa6JipLOktdwsukempcPnuDHpoWi_Rwb8g_ie25CLDZJoIVFG3_-TOs&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=zFHcyOObqzmw1_drnfARhA&oh=00_AfmuL1teixo5JDHHH972ppaT4ruHMRLyDrXak_W5XM43mg&oe=69581378)
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75302218_2068538016921333_8411850603412514976_n.mp4?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=P2P6wQ3I3FEQ7kNvwHp66B8&_nc_oc=Adlt1MTwdtY64zyd5nU5O5nmAf0MCdgHzukgZWPF310-Qh8q5o2xJcZ43z6vR5WlwB8&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=zFHcyOObqzmw1_drnfARhA&oh=00_AfmJ5FYILwoLy4lRRhgAqS9L9HEI-PmKL8GMK0ljyOFKkQ&oe=695818E4)
With hundreds of weapon customizations, you can truly craft a unique instrument of killing you can call your own. Combine with our physics-based combat mechanics, you can perform all the weapon techniques in game. Oh, did I mention, if you’re using a claymore, you can even do mordhau.
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39031422_997444645745145_5320263794737829877_n.mp4?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=Ykxk3eBlHAkQ7kNvwHDluJs&_nc_oc=AdmUP9eBfzlT27Jl8sBnXLredPXkvIq62JEUZCtse2GTHB-nUltWZmJx4I-pte3gcpI&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=zFHcyOObqzmw1_drnfARhA&oh=00_AfkPl2e_jNHwH5XlD3bwaxsDbbUJTXWMY7PKQFUrAcxK5g&oe=6958414E)

There are more than a dozen bosses to challenge, each with their unique design and backstory. They’re not your typical damage sponges, fights with them are epic battle of wits and agility, brains and brawn.
